elements.title: Härnösand Residence (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Härnösand Residence (pictured) is one of the earliest examples of Neoclassical architecture in Sweden?

elements.title: Greg Foran (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that as CEO of Walmart US, Greg Foran would go undercover as a shopper?

elements.title: Mario Party DS (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mario Party DS's minigames feature "minimized" Mario characters?

elements.title: Fred Provo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Fred Provo was told he would have to have his arm amputated due to a wound sustained in World War II, but refused, recovered, and went on to play in the National Football League?

elements.title: Substitute Teacher (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Key & Peele sketch "Substitute Teacher" was analyzed for its racial commentary and educational insight?

elements.title: Bou (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the musician Bou went from being fired from an IT apprenticeship for producing beats during company time to having songs rank on the UK Singles Chart?

elements.title: Mulu Manek (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Indian director Manhar Raskapur's films Mulu Manek and Kadu Makrani were both remade during the 1970s?

elements.title: Ged Kearney (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ged Kearney represented Batman in the Parliament of Australia from 2018 to 2019?
